segments.text: I'm looking at two children nearby, involved in their own scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is climbing on a wobbly two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet labeled 'COOKIE JAR'.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His posture looks incredibly precarious up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really think that stool is going to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand raised, anticipating a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a classic act of secret cookie raiding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so coordinated in their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in a nasty fall, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool's legs are splayed outwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're taking a big risk for those sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer recklessness of it is astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they manage to grab their treats without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little faces show such focused determination.
segments.speaker: PAR
